titles.title: BEAMS Act of 2020
BEAMS Act of 2020
Blocking Evasive Attempts to Manipulate Signals Act of 2020
Blocking Evasive Attempts to Manipulate Signals Act of 2020
BEAMS Act of 2020

A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to clarify the situations in which the Federal Communications Commission may grant a request for the transfer of certain permits, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
